name: client

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && node server.js" "cd client && npm start"

description: This is a community project focused on data visualization which utilizes the REFlex addon [REFlex - Arena/Battleground Historian](https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/reflex-battleground-historian) that provides a CSV dump of previous arena matches allowing users to paste that data into the Arena Data website and rendering beautiful visualizations representing their progress.
